oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rational Points on the Intersection of Three Quadrics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Heath-Brown, D. R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Number Theory
11D25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper proves the Hasse principle and weak approximation for varieties defined by the smooth intersection of three quadratics in at least 19 variables, over arbitrary number fields.
